name: Rate Assistance Program (RAP)
description: Up to 25% off gas and/or electricity charges on monthly utility bills for those with financial hardship or medical conditions requiring higher utility use
fullDescription: The City of Palo Alto Utilities Rate Assistance Program provides significant discounts on utility bills for residents experiencing financial hardship or medical conditions requiring higher utility use.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to 25% off gas charges
- Up to 25% off electricity charges
- For financial hardship situations
- For medical conditions requiring higher utility use
- Applied to monthly utility bills
- Ongoing assistance while eligible
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a City of Palo Alto Utilities customer
2. Must demonstrate financial hardship
3. Or have medical condition requiring higher utility use
4. Complete application form
5. Submit supporting documentation
6. Discount applied once approved
keywords: Palo Alto, CPAU, RAP, 25% discount, gas, electricity, financial hardship, medical condition, low-income
